snippet: What is the best way to escape basketball exile in China? Apparently, you should try to do it over the Lunar New Year, China's biggest national holiday, when most of the country is closed down for almost a week during late January or February.
abstract: What is the best way to escape basketball exile in China? Apparently, you should try to do it over the Lunar New Year, China's biggest national holiday, when most of the country is closed down for almost a week during late January or February.

headline.main: Kenyon Martin Beats the China Trap With the Old Lunar New Year Play
